blocks.block_text: " Most of all , like a good race - horse , to hold the reader's attention the short story must get off to a good start . It's the start and the finish that count , and the beginning , the right beginning is usually the harder for the creater to obtain , in the hands of the amateurs here is where the catastrophe usually
